      • detectPattern

        public boolean detectPattern(int stepID)
        Description copied from class: KahinaStepPropertySensor
        Returns true iff a step has the property detected by this sensor. The default sensor never detects a pattern.
        Overrides:
        detectPattern in class KahinaStepPropertySensor
        Parameters:
        stepID - ID of the step which the sensor is to detect for its property.
        Returns:
        true if the sensor's step property is detected, false if it is not.
